text: What is the function of a 'Collider' component in Unity? Select one answer.

options.text: To provide audio effects to a GameObject.
To define the space within which a GameObject can physically interact with other objects.
To define the visual appearance of a GameObject.
To control the animation states of a GameObject.

feedbackCorrect: A 'Collider' component in Unity defines the space within which a GameObject can physically interact with other objects. It essentially provides a shape to a GameObject for purposes of physical collisions.
feedbackIncorrect: A 'Collider' component in Unity defines the space within which a GameObject can physically interact with other objects. It essentially provides a shape to a GameObject for purposes of physical collisions.
